# formal_group (Data Source)

Data source for looking up a Group by ID or by name. Use either `id` or `name`, but not both.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this Group.
- `name` (String) The name of the Group to look up. Use this to fetch a group by name.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description for this Group.
- `termination_protection` (Boolean) If set to true, this Group cannot be deleted.
